name: Fighting game (AlphaMan)
description:
Alpha Man:

"a" is left, "d" is right, "s" is crouch, "w" is jump

"1" is punch, "2" is kick

"shift" is low punch, "control" is low kick, "w" + "control" is jump kick

Angry Girlfriend:

"left arrow" is left, "right arrow" is right, "up arrow" is jump, and "down arrow" is crouch

"9" is punch, "0" is kick

";" is low punch, " ' " is low kick, "up arrow" + " ' " is jump kick
